attributes.action: No Toll increase on Dartford / Essex Crossing this October 2012
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the government NOT to put the price up on the Tunnels and QE2 bridge crossings this October from £1.50 to £2.00 per Car & then again in 2014 for another increase to £2.50.
This will mean that for a lorry to pass one way it will cost £6.00 which means more cost for the haulage firms to move goods around the country and then mean higher prices for you.
keep the promises of previous administrations and remove the toll charges imposed on road traffic using the Dartford Crossing.
Have a look at this link showing the proposed price hike http://twitpic.com/9nxx2s
Follow on Twitter Dartfordbridge1
Please Sign and help thanks
